data.title: Good stuff
data.text: Red wine flight. We enjoyed each one. Tasting room cute & cozy. Staff very friendly and very knowledgeable. Nice variety of items for sale. Souvenirs/keepsakes. Fun wine tasting right off State street in SB.

data.title: Amazing quality
data.text: The wine was rich in flavor, and surrounded by charming people and craftsmanship.  The cabs have an earthiness that is distinct to the region.  But, they have an even more beautiful vineyard than their tasting room.  If you can, make your way over and book a reservation/tour.  The whole package is really one of a kind.  I can't say enough about how much fun we had.  I want to bring more friends to the area just to have an excuse to go back!

data.title: Deep Reds, Crisp Whites, Good Service, Knowledgeable Staff
data.text: Nice people working here, laid back and charming winery in town. Prices are not too bad, and service is good. TIP: take in your own chocolate or cheese, it makes a nice component to the wine tastings and they have some available but are limited. Look for a coupon deal, we found a LivingSocial wine tasting pack, well worth it.

data.title: Good Wines
data.text: The wines weren't cheap, but they were very good.  The woman behind the bar wasn't quite as open and friendly as the men at Au Bon Climat and Margerum had been, but she did know a lot about the wines.

data.title: Next to last stop on wine walk
data.text: After trying all the wine stops in the Funk Zone we made it to Grassini and almost did not go as they are a bit of a distance from the FZ.  This was the first wine tasting of that said buy me and we did purchase wine. They have some really nice reds. Highly recommend.

data.title: Best Winery of Santa Barbara!
data.text: We did a tasting at the vineyard a few weeks ago.  We had such a great time...the tour of the winery and grounds were amazing!  But the wine, oh the wine!  We bought at least a case and two of their beautiful glasses.  I am going to join the wine club for two reasons - first the wine is delicious and second the events look fabulous.  Can hardly wait to come back!

data.title: Quality over quantity
data.text: Grassini Family Vineyards makes wine with and for people who have a passion for quality. Everyone involved in the production of the wines understands that a few little details make for an amazing experience. I knew that Cabernet and Sauvignon Blanc for years but I only began to appreciate what they could and should be after a visit to Grassini Family Vineyards. They don't make a lot of wine but what they make is amazing. Take a relaxing trip up the central coast and begin or end with at trip to GFV. You will not regret it.

data.title: Best Wine Tasting Ever!
data.text: My husband and I visited Grassini Family Vineyards tasting room in Santa Barbara last weekend and absolutely loved it! The wine experts were so friendly and knowledgable. They really took their time walking us through each selection. The Sauvignon Blanc and Cabernet were my favorites. I highly recommend putting this vineyard at the top of your list!

data.title: Articondo Blend
data.text: Received a bottle of 2012 Articondo red wine as a gift. It is a blend of exceptional red wines and ready to drink now. Was so impressed I immediately ordered a case!  Rick  Kidwell, Elko Nevada.

data.title: Great Wines!
data.text: The Happy Canyon Sauvignon Blanc and Articondo is amazing!  Katie Grassini is amazing and so kind!  It's a wonderful atmosphere!

data.title: Best Winery I have ever visited!!!
data.text: The most beautiful setting and the most amazing wines!  Absolute must visit Vineyard! I have visited a lot of wineries and this is by far my favorite!

data.title: Love it.
data.text:
The wines I tasted at the Grassini tasting room in Santa Barbara were outstanding

The "Happy Canyon Sauvignon Blanc" and the "Articondo Blend" were exiting, but the "Estate Cab." was WOW!!
When I was there, Katie Grassini was there to host the tastings and she did a great job. I can't wait to go back to Santa Barbara and the Grassini tasting room. Unfortunatly this will take some time for I live about 9000 km away in The Netherlands.

data.title: A Must!!!!
data.text: The Grassini Family wine is a true gem! The wine is fantastic and the people that work at their tasting room are very nice and energetic. After the wonderful experience I had, I sent my parents there and they absolutely loved it and came back with TONS of wine! I would definitely recommend putting this on your wine tasting list OR just for a nice glass when in SB!!!!

data.title: Intimate and Inviting
data.text: The Grassini Family Vineyards tasting room on Anacapa street is a must when in Santa Barbara. The staff are friendly and the pours are generous!!!!! The tasting room is intimate and inviting.  The wood bar is breath taking and the leather chairs are comfy.  The TV has a continuous feed of pictures from the vineyard so eventhough you are tasting in downtown Santa Barbara you feel like you could be at the vineyard.  I went with a group of girlfriends and we ended up spending a long time enjoying multiple tastes of wine and chatting with the staff.  The wine is excellent and well priced for the quality. I will definitely go back.

data.title: Great wine, friendly staff and beautiful tasting room right off state stree
data.text: This tasting room is a hidden gem just off state street. If you stop in, you won't be disappointed. The staff (mostly Grassini family members) are all very passionate about their wine and proud, as they should be. It's a wonderful winery that anyone would be happy to visit and take a few bottles home.

data.title: Poca cura dei clienti
data.text: Questo locale dispone di grande potenzialità ma purtroppo non le sfrutta. Possibilità di scegliere il numero dei vini da scegliere. Ovviamente con differenza di costo. Prezzi alti per quello che versano nel bicchiere.
